titles.title: Minority Equity Capital Formation Act of 1993
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide incentives for investments in small business enterprises owned by disadvantaged individuals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E902-903)

bill.summary: 4/2/1993--Introduced. Minority Equity Capital Formation Act of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a minority venture capital fund credit of 20 percent of the aggregate bases of qualified minority fund interests, with limitations. Sets forth recapture provisions for such stock. Makes such credit a part of the general business credit and allows it to offset a portion of the tentative minimum tax.
